meta.description: Configuration profile for STUNIR build harness. Optimized for high-security, minimal-dependency environments.

determinism_guarantee.enforcement: Strict IEEE 754-2008 compliance with fixed rounding mode (Round-to-Nearest-Even).

hashing_stability.property: Collision resistance implies unique artifact identification.

environment_drift.check: Compare env_vars against captured build receipt
environment_drift.action: Fail build if critical vars (STUNIR_*) differ.

checksum_mismatch.check: Verify input file hashes against manifest before processing
checksum_mismatch.action: Halt immediately to prevent poisoned build.

epoch_derivation.input: Sorted list of all spec file hashes
epoch_derivation.output: Unique Epoch ID for the build.
